title: Amistad National Recreation Area: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions           Click on this map for a larger version (Adobe PDF).   Getting There  By Car Amistad National Recreation Area is located on the US-Mexico border near Del Rio, Texas. The park is 160 miles west of San Antonio on US 90, and about 230 miles east of Big Bend via US 90 and US 385. Access to Amistad from the north or south is via US 277/377.  By Train Rail service is available in Del Rio (DRT). The Station Building is located at 100 North Main Street. Contact Amtrak for specific schedules.  By Plane Commercial airline service is not available in Del Rio.  The nearest airports to Amistad National Recreation Area include: San Antonio (SAT), San Angelo (SJT), Midland (MAF), and El Paso (ELP).
